description: This file defines API route handlers for managing MongoDB instances within a FastAPI application. It includes endpoints for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting instances, and references external schemas, services, and FastAPI components.

methods.name: InstanceListResponse list_instances(request: Request)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all configured MongoDB instances in memory.

methods.name: InstanceOut create_instance(request: Request, payload: InstanceCreate)
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new MongoDB instance configuration.

methods.name: InstanceOut get_instance(request: Request, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"))
methods.description: Handles GET requests to fetch details of a single instance by ID.

methods.name: InstanceOut update_instance( request: Request, payload: InstanceUpdate, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"), )
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing instance by ID.

methods.name: None delete_instance(request: Request, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"))
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove an instance by ID.

ctags.name: delete_instance
ctags.pattern: /^def delete_instance(request: Request, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identif/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"))

ctags.name: get_instance
ctags.pattern: /^def get_instance(request: Request, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"))

ctags.name: update_instance
ctags.signature: ( request: Request, payload: InstanceUpdate, instance_id: str = Path(..., description="Instance identifier"), )
